title: False reporting
body: If somebody is picking a verbal fight with you, and you don't just passively take in the bullshit, shouldn't you not get banned? They are engaging on YOU so why just take their shit all the time? I am royally annoyed

replies.body:
Oh no he's lagging out

lets report him for afk

Fighting fire with fire isn't always the best route to take with players like that. I find it much more satisfying to take the higher route and report them in post game to make sure their account gets flagged.
same thing happened to me last season, only thing you can do is /mute all and report after game.
